ht have sup-
plied. We simply don’t know what the right way to look at this problem is.
But, given our ignorance, we shouldn’t make wild guesses and then declare
that the probabilities are so low that evolution under natural selection is
impossible. A better research strategy would be to try to assemble informa-
tion that will replace the guesses with serious estimates.
